channel.title: Need help with Colouring writing
channel.description: On 1 of my servers, when you look at the ancient spell book, or the normal 1, the spell name is red and the spell information is blue, how do i do it to my new server? Any1? If you could help i would be very greatful.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 22, 2008, 04:27:21 AM[/size][hr]And how do i change the name of that spell.. I managed to do it on my other serv.. But this 1 has different files..

item.title: Need help with Colouring writing
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

Well, this is very simple. Just put any of these colors before the text:
@red@
@whi@
@blu@
@yel@
@gre@
@dre@
For example, you can type this in:

sendQuest("@red@This text is red.", 8000);

Read full topic
